projects.title: Music Instruments Learning
details: 1. This is a Full Stack Website with three roles: Admin, Instructor, and Student.
2. Admin can assign roles and remove users.
3. Instructors can add classes, which need admin approval.
projects.technologies: VS Code | Firebase | MongoDB | Vercel | GitHub | Tailwind CSS | DaisyUI | React-Router | Axios | JWT | Node.js

projects.title: Chef Recipe Hunter
details: 1. Users can sign up via GitHub, Google, or Email-Password.
3. Logged-in users can view chefs and their recipes.
projects.technologies: VS Code | Firebase | MongoDB | Vercel | GitHub | React-Bootstrap | React-Router

projects.title: Toy Planet Car Market
details: 3. Logged-in users can access My Toys and All Toys pages.
projects.technologies: VS Code | Firebase | MongoDB | Vercel | GitHub | Tailwind CSS | DaisyUI | React-Router
